references: N. G. Johansson, Efficient Simulation of the Deutsch-Jozsa Algorithm, Master's Project, Department of Electrical Engineering & Department of Physics, Chemistry and Biology, Linkoping University, April, 2015. See Eq. (3.15).
formula: Central binomial coefficients for powers of 2: a(n)=A001405[A000079(n)]. - _Labos Elemer_, Apr 11 2001a(n) ~ 2^(2^n - n/2 + 1/2)/ sqrt(Pi). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 13 2014
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sum(i=0, 2^(n-1), binomial(2^(n-1), i)^2)  \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 09 2013
author: _John Tromp_, Dec 11 1999
